pain_location.area: Right side of lower back, about 2 inches right of spine, above tailbone
pain_location.description: Pain starts in right lower back above tailbone, sometimes going down right leg

pain_history.history: Had back problems for about 5 years, but this episode is worse than usual.
pain_history.most_recent_episode: Started yesterday morning when lifting boxes at work.
pain_history.most_recent_episode_duration: About 30 hours, constant since yesterday morning.
pain_history.most_recent_episode_details: Much sharper pain than usual back aches. Leg pain is new.

current_condition.current_condition_status: Pain present and pretty bad. Medication isn't helping much.
current_condition.status_change: Pain is getting worse, especially when sitting or standing.

factors.aggravating_factors: Sitting, standing, bending forward, and coughing make pain much worse.
factors.precipitating_factors: Lifting heavy boxes at work without proper form.
factors.relieving_factors: Lying flat with pillow under knees and heat therapy help a little.

behavioral.behavioral_reactions: Holds breath, tenses up, moves very slowly and carefully.

extracted_data.associated_symptoms: Muscle spasms in back and occasional tingling in right foot.

character.onset_when: Worst in morning and evening after being on feet.
character.frequency: Usual back pain once a week; this severe pain is new.
character.duration: Regular pain a few hours; this episode constant for 30 hours.
character.quality: Sharp, shooting pain with some burning sensations.
character.radiates: Shoots down right leg, sometimes to foot.
character.refers: Sometimes felt in right hip area.
character.related_to: Lifting injury at work and job with heavy lifting.
character.interferes_with: Sitting, standing, walking, sleeping, working, daily activities.

extracted_data.intractable: Feels intractable. Nothing is really helping.
extracted_data.treatment_response: Ibuprofen and muscle relaxer provide little relief. Needs something stronger.
extracted_data.note: Worried about returning to work as pain affects ability to provide for family.
